text: The Portland Winterhawks are an American professional ice hockey team that began playing in 1976. They currently play in the Western Hockey League. They play their home games in Portland, Oregon at both the Memorial Coliseum and Rose Garden arenas. They have won 2 Memorial Cups in 1982 and 1997. They have also won 2 President's Cups in 1981 and 1997. They were originally known as the Portland Winter Hawks until May 2009 when they took out the space. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:1976 establishments in the United States Category:Canadian Hockey League teams Category:Ice hockey teams in the United States Category:Western Hockey League Category:Organizations based in Oregon Category:Portland, Oregon Category:1970s establishments in Canada Category:1970s establishments in Oregon
title: Portland Winterhawks
